displayName.text: FE Air duct cleaning and Dryer vent cleaning of New York

formattedAddress: 100 Avenue A, New York, NY 10009, USA
adrFormatAddress: 100 Avenue A, New York, NY 10009, USA

originalText.text:
RUN. This is a scam.  They connected me to a handyman which finished 1/3 of the work, took a deposit for 75%, and never came back.  I never heard from the handyman again despite repeated calls and texts.  Fast Handyman East Village (and their assorted names/telephone numbers) promised to help but then never responded.  I called back several times and they eventually stopped answering and blocked my phone number. Terrible experience.

Watch out for them and their other names... they all connect you with an automated message that says that you are about to connect to the Handyman service and tells you your place in line prior to the receptionist picking up.

Good luck!

originalText.text: Robb, our neighbor, recommended Fast Handyman East Village when I asked him what’s the best company to fix our broken chairs. He was right! Fast Handyman East Village was truly amazing! They fixed the problem thoroughly. Well done!

originalText.text: I was glad that I called Fast Handyman East Village. Our cabinets needed some repairmen. Thankfully, Fast Handyman East Village has punctual workers who will never think twice of helping customers! Five stars for a fabulous job!

originalText.text: Most wonderful company I ever had! They got passed my expectations. I loved their work so much and never have to worry about the cost. It was very convenient working with them especially that their staffs are very well-mannered. Five stars!
